meanings.definition: Feeling or showing envy of someone or their achievements.
meanings.sent1: She became even jealouser when she saw her friend's new bike.
meanings.sent2: He felt jealouser than ever when his brother got a higher score.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked jealouser than the dog when the owner petted the dog first.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes grew even jealouser as she watched her rival receive the award.
meanings.sent5: The green monster of jealousy grew even jealouser within her heart.
